    • hasSameCoordinates

      public boolean hasSameCoordinates​(int line, int column)
      Check if the fields line and column of the word are the same as the line and column in the parameters
      Parameters:
      line - The value of the line we want our field to be equals to
      column - The value of the column we want our field to be equals to
      Returns:
      True if this.line == line and this.column == column, otherwise false

    • drawWord

      public void drawWord​(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, float line, float column, float cellSize)
      Draw the word on the board at the coordinates (column, line) with a size = cellSize
      Parameters:
      context - ApplicationContext
      line - The line we are drawing the word at
      column - The column we are drawing the word at
      cellSize - The word size

    • moveWord

      public boolean moveWord​(Board board, java.lang.String direction, java.util.ArrayList<Noun> nounsToRemove) throws java.io.IOException
      Check if the noun can move in the board based on the direction it's going
      Parameters:
      board - The board of the game
      direction - The direction of the noun (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT)
      nounsToRemove - List of noun we need to remove from the board after calling this function
      Returns:
      True if the noun can move, otherwise false
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
